A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 24, 2010''', at 21:19 UTC.<ref>{{citation|url=http://notch.tumblr.com/post/351321921/chests-and-generic-tile-entity-support|title=Chests, and generic tile entity support|section=|website=[https://web.archive.org/web/20140427003832/http://notch.tumblr.com/ The World of Notch]|author=[[Markus Persson]]|date=January 24, 2010|quote=Another indev update!|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140427012420/http://notch.tumblr.com/post/351321921/chests-and-generic-tile-entity-support}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Chest (S) JE1.png|32px]][[File:Large Chest JE1.png|52px]] [[Chest]]s'''
* Can be used to store items.
* Placing a duo of chests next to each other creates a large chest with with double as much storage.
* Triple chests can now be generated by placing two chests with air in between, then placing a chest in the open space in between.

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Starting House JE1.png|40px]] [[Starting House]]'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://notch.tumblr.com/post/387901149/that-was-a-lot-of-work-but-it-should-behave-better-now|title=That was a lot of work, but it should behave better now|section=|website=[https://web.archive.org/web/20140427003832/http://notch.tumblr.com/ The World of Notch]|author=[[Markus Persson]]|date=February 14, 2010|quote=The starting house will only spawn in nice places now. Mostly. ;)|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140427012050/notch.tumblr.com/post/387901149/that-was-a-lot-of-work-but-it-should-behave-better-now}}</ref>
* New generated structure.<ref group="note">Generates only in Survival mode</ref>
* Player would spawn with chests full of every accessible block and tool in the game, except for dirt, water, lava, fire, and double slabs.
* Made out of [[mossy cobblestone|moss stone]].

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''General'''
* The player can now drop whole stacks of items instead of one at a time.
* Stacked blocks limit changed back to 99 items per stack.
* Now spin when dropped on the ground.{{verify|type=untestable|edition=java|could be the next version}}

[[File:Arrow (item) JE1 BE1.png|32px]]''' [[Arrow]]s'''
* Now has a new sound effect.

[[File:Iron Axe JE3.png|32px]]''' [[Axe]]s'''
* Texture has been revised.
** The axe has been repositioned to the left instead of the right.</onlyinclude>
